hero.title: Modern Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 65 Gurugram
description: Sector 65 Gurugram is a rapidly developing residential locality situated along Golf Course Extension Road, offering a perfect mix of modern infrastructure and everyday convenience. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram prefer this area due to its excellent connectivity to major IT hubs, Sohna Road, and central Gurugram. The sector is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls, cafes, and daily utility stores, making it a practical and comfortable choice for families and working professionals.

Independent houses in Sector 65 are known for their spacious layouts, better ventilation, and privacy compared to high-rise apartments. The locality offers a peaceful environment while still being close to premium lifestyle destinations. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram ensures comfortable living, modern surroundings, and strong connectivity in one of Gurugram’s most preferred residential zones.

faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 65 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 65 is a modern and well-connected locality with good infrastructure and lifestyle amenities.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Independent houses from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available for different budgets and family sizes.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the sector has schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping areas nearby, making it ideal for families.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 65 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, furnishings, and location, offering mid-range to premium options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Sector 65 is well-connected via Golf Course Extension Road and major city routes.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 65?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families, depending on owner preferences.

faqs.question: Is Sector 65 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered a safe and well-developed residential locality.
